name: Milf Bar
description:
"Milf Bar" is our new game, with a beautiful boss who needs your help. With beautiful and enhanced 3D!

All with easy mini puzzles and mini click games. You just have to click with your mouse on the correct combinations to solve the puzzles and create great cocktails.
In the game you will have to solve her problems and help her with your talent. Maybe you should improve your technique too.

What you will find in the game:
• Beautiful images and animations.
• Incredible sound and visual effects.
• Gallery with beautiful videos, all in 3D!
